tasks.label: GitHb: Generate and Upload OTA files
tasks.command: (Get-FileHash -Path .\.esphome\build\${fileBasenameNoExtension}\.pioenvs\${fileBasenameNoExtension}\firmware.ota.bin -Algorithm md5).Hash.ToLower() | Out-File -FilePath .\.esphome\build\${fileBasenameNoExtension}\.pioenvs\${fileBasenameNoExtension}\firmware.md5 -Encoding ASCII; gh release upload '${fileBasenameNoExtension}_ota'.ToLower() .\.esphome\build\${fileBasenameNoExtension}\.pioenvs\${fileBasenameNoExtension}\firmware.ota.bin .\.esphome\build\${fileBasenameNoExtension}\.pioenvs\${fileBasenameNoExtension}\firmware.md5 --repo jimwsmith/ESPHome --clobber
